regen.absent_element: alerts when UAV operations exceed preset limits
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the operator whenever UAV operations exceed preset limits to ensure efficient and safe UAV operations.

regen.absent_element: situation of alert when preset limits are exceeded
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall alert the operator when any preset limit of airspeed, altitude, or fuel is exceeded to ensure safe and efficient UAV operations.

regen.absent_element: alerting when out of preset limits
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall generate an alert if preset limits (airspeed, altitude, or fuel) are exceeded to ensure efficient and safe UAV operations.

label: TCS shall notify the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
absence: action of notifying the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
